title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Partners
body: Partners          The National Park Service proudly recognizes the National Park Foundation as its official charitable partner. "Corporate support has played an important role in the National Park System since its inception in 1916. This tradition of generous, committed support continues today and is critical to the success and longevity of our national parks. Many of the national parks and programs that exist today would not be possible without corporate funding" - National Park Foundation.
